Text: Anyone know if this ones for real?
Utorrent gave me a warning before opening the file and Zonealarm alerted me to suspicious behavour when I clicked the Setup File. I think this is a fake.

I'm going to install it in Sandboxie once I get it downloaded. I'll be able to tell you what is going on.

Get Sandboxie at http://www.sandboxie.com/index.php?DownloadSandboxie

Believe me this is the way to test out keygens, and new untrusted installs. It will keep those files out of your system.
Works for me so far.  I'm still in the starting area but the few fights you can get into I have done and no problems what so ever.

Just finished installing and it is fully working.
And already cracked. as azaq318 said in his info, just install and play. :)
Works great, and it comes up clean for virus's. Look good guys!

Silvak

Thank you for you confirmation. Cheers!

ah yes...the way role playing was meant to be played....this works fantastic and the game is just a great as it was 15 years ago.....it did lock up once after my first battle but, I restarted it with "run as administrator" checked and havent had any problems since....dunno if it was the actuall fix or not .. maybe just a hickup on my computer...works great now...thanks for the upload!!!!
